name: Ext_R5_NutritionOrder_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.NutritionOrder.subject for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents NutritionOrder.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionOrder|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Who requires the diet, formula or nutritional supplement
element.definition: The person or set of individuals who needs the nutrition order for an oral diet, nutritional supplement and/or enteral or formula feeding.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.subject` maps to R4B `NutritionOrder.patient`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Group)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Who requires the diet, formula or nutritional supplement
element.definition: The person or set of individuals who needs the nutrition order for an oral diet, nutritional supplement and/or enteral or formula feeding.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.subject` maps to R4B `NutritionOrder.patient`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Group)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
